title: Whoops! Something broke. Bugsplat since update.
body:
I'm unable to load into games since update with arcade skins. I can go through queue and champ select, yet once it goes to the loading screen, it bugsplat's. I have tried everything from restarting client, to restarting PC, to uninstalling league and reinstalling, nothing is helping. I'm hoping someone can give me some insight on how I can fix this? and if anyone else is having this problem?  I'd really love to start using my Arcade{{champion:42}} as soon as possible <3
Thanks.

replies.body: It sounds like something is failing the game to render properly, and can be caused for a few reasons like drivers or bad game files.  Use our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) for a series of steps and updates to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!
Well, I've tried just about everything in Riot's Game Crash and still no luck. Please send help ! :P

Thanks for the update!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can help out!  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach some logs for more context on your specific issue.  We'll respond to your ticket asap!

"Hey HolyHam,

Ichiban Ramen here with Riot Tech support and today I'll be assisting you. I'm sorry to hear that you're having problems with your game client. I'm here to help, so let's work together to get this resolved. It appears that there was a Windows 10 Anniversary update that was released that is causing problems like players crashing out of the client or fps issues. This seems to be specifically caused by a new feature called the Game DVR. To resolve this go to your Xbox settings in your Windows 10 settings and disable Game DVR. If that does not work, roll back the anniversary update that Windows 10 released by restoring to a point before the update or uninstalling the update altogether. 
Thanks,

BowlO'Ramen 
Tech Support - Fizz OP
"Lunch time!" 

____This is what BowlO'Ramen suggested to fix the problem. I can't say I tried it because I restored my whole PC to Fac settings to get it to work before this option became available to me. Let me know if this helps!

I got the same problem today and disabled Game DVR through the registry. 
Now everythings OK again. 
Thanks to BowlO'Ramen !
